species.name: vanillish
descriptions: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.
Hot days cause its body to melt. It can be restored by refreezing it, but the process leaves its body slightly warped.
It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.
It conceals itself from enemy eyes by creating many small ice particles and hiding among them.
It sprays its enemies with grains of ice to freeze them. Most Vanillish in Alola are smaller than average.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

abilities.name: snow-cloak
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
